Package pluginlib

Interface Summary
AbstractOption.Listener An interface for the listeners that are fired when options change.
AbstractPreference.Listener An interface for the listeners that are fired when options change.
 

Class Summary
AbstractOption This is a base class for persistent options.
AbstractOption.BooleanOption An option that has a boolean value
AbstractOption.ChoiceOption An option that has a String value
AbstractOption.StringOption An option that has a String value
AbstractPreference This is a base class for persistent options.
AbstractPreference.BooleanOption An option that has a boolean value
AbstractPreference.ChoiceOption An option that has a String value
AbstractPreference.StringOption An option that has a String value
Log This class provides a uniform interface for logging informational and error messages.
Log.StreamToConsole This class is an OutputStream that, when written to, writes the data to the Eclipse Console supplied in the constructor.
Options This class holds (as static variables) the persistent options of the program.
OptionWidget This class is a base class for the controls that are used in the property page; each control is connected to an Option object.
OptionWidget.BooleanWidget This class implements a PropertyWidget for a boolean-valued property, associating it with a check-box Button in the UI.
OptionWidget.ChoiceWidget A UI widget that offers a selection from a fixed set of strings, corresponding to a ChoiceOption.
OptionWidget.FileWidget This class implements an OptionWidget for a text field property that holds a file name, using the FileTextField widget, which incorporates a Browse button.
OptionWidget.Label This class implements an OptionWidget that is a Label, so that it can sit in lists of OptionWidgets.
PreferencePage A superclass of property pages for plugins, providing some generic utility functionality.
PreferenceWidget This class is a base class for the controls that are used in the property page; each control is connected to an Option object.
PreferenceWidget.BooleanWidget This class implements a PropertyWidget for a boolean-valued property, associating it with a check-box Button in the UI.
PreferenceWidget.ChoiceWidget A UI widget that offers a selection from a fixed set of strings, corresponding to a ChoiceOption.
PreferenceWidget.FileWidget This class implements an OptionWidget for a text field property that holds a file name, using the FileTextField widget, which incorporates a Browse button.
PreferenceWidget.Label This class implements an PreferenceWidget that is a Label, so that it can sit in lists of PreferenceWidgets.
PropertyPage A superclass of property pages for plugins, providing some generic utility functionality.
Props This class consists of utility functions for saving properties associated with keys - currently using IResource persistent properties.
Utils This class contains a number of (static) utility methods for use in plugins.
Widgets This class just holds a bunch of related classes which are custom widgets for building dialogs.
Widgets.FileTextField A custom widget that is used to provide a way for the user to specify a file; it combines a label, a Browse button, and a text field.
Widgets.HComposite A composite that lays its children out in a number of columns.
Widgets.LabeledSeparator A custom widget that is a separator followed by a label, typically used as a title to a set of widgets below it.
Widgets.VComposite A custom widget that lays out its children in one vertical column.
ZipEditorInput This class is used to provide an IEditorInput from files that are in a jar file, so that entries in a jar file can be displayed (readonly) in an editor within Eclipse.
